abstract: Former Florida A&M band member Dante Martin is sentenced to more than six years in prison in hazing death of drum major Robert Champion.
lead_paragraph: A former Florida A&M University band member was sentenced Friday to more than six years in prison for manslaughter and felony hazing in the death of a drum major.
snippet: A former Florida A&M University band member was sentenced Friday to more than six years in prison for manslaughter and felony hazing in the death of a drum major.

headline.main: Florida: 6-Year Prison Term for Florida A&M University Hazing Death
headline.print_headline: Florida: 6-Year Prison Term for Hazing Death
